lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Canada will broaden a federal sales tax levied on manufacturers before scrapping the system in favor of a broad based, multi-staged sales tax, finance minister Michael Wilson said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The existing federal sales tax system hurts the Canadian economy by putting more tax on Canadian produced goods than imported goods and adding a hidden tax on Canadian exports that makes them less competitive, Wilson said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The finance deparment said the main drawback of a value added tax is that it would be more complex and costly to implement than the other two proposals.
